environment.env Module¶

class environment.env.Env(config, edge_locations, out_dict, index_dict)¶

Bases: object

Environment class for the SUMO-RL project.

Todo

Clean up config stuff

__init__(config, edge_locations, out_dict, index_dict)¶

Initialize the environment with the given configuration and parameters.

Parameters:

  • config (dict) – Configuration dictionary.

  • edge_locations (dict) – Edge locations dictionary.

  • out_dict (dict) – Output dictionary.

  • index_dict (dict) – Index dictionary.

close(episode, accu, current_epsilon)¶

Close the environment and log rewards.

Parameters:

  • episode (int) – Current episode number.

  • accu (float) – Accumulated reward.

  • current_epsilon (float) – Current epsilon value.

get_route_length(route)¶

Get the total length of the route.

Parameters:

route (list) – List of edges in the route.

Returns:

Total length of the route.

Return type:

int

perform_step(vehicle, action, destination_edge)¶

Perform a step in the environment by moving the vehicle.

Parameters:

  • vehicle – Vehicle object.

  • action – Action to be performed.

  • destination_edge – Destination edge for the vehicle.

Returns:

Current edge of the vehicle after performing the step.

Return type:

vedge

quiet_close()¶

Quietly close the environment without logging.

render(mode='text')¶

Render the environment.

Parameters:

mode (str) – Mode of rendering. Options are ‘human’, ‘text’, ‘no_gui’.

reset(seed=42)¶

Reset the environment to its initial state.

Parameters:

seed (int) – Random seed for reproducibility.

Returns:

Initial observation after reset.

Return type:

observation

step(action)¶

Perform an action in the environment.

Parameters:

action – Action to be performed.

Returns:

Next state. reward: Reward obtained. done: Whether the episode is done. info: Additional info.

Return type:

observation
